title: lost 5 games in a row for placements
body: This is unbelievable riot, thanks for ruining this game, go fuck urseleves

replies.body:
it's not just the rank of people, it's the attitude.... 
I'm a supp main and I've had this...
- Morgana/Jhin, great game... put me in iron4 tho... hmmm ok
- Game with Karthus adc... hmm ok that kinda worked, but we lost cuz people gave up on other lanes
- Game with Ahri ADC... nope, didn't work ad she AFK after 1 death
- Morgana/Cait, was working fine for the first few minutes, then our top/mid were smashed and gave up which in their laners free roaming for 4v2 bot very often

so... yeah... RITO, you got a problem matching peopel that wants to play properly and push forward and apes that come to troll and screw everything up...

Why not making the rank something more like PERSONAL PLAYING QUALITY like the grading system?

i agree, i also think they really screwed solo/duo ranked que when they stopped rewarding per the player rather as a whole team all the time, like i get its a team game and all but when you get people who don't want to play properly or whatever, it doesn't matter how well you play you best be sure your losing 20 lp as well, its crap.
I've said this for a year and a half now, and everytime I get "working as intended" and "there is no match making issue"

Play during pre-season they said, it'll help make a difference in future they said, made fuck all difference.

Climbed to G3 then got placement games filled with apes and now I'm S4. Slowly climbing back though!

i wish i had half your luck, im currently on a 7 loss streak with one of those games being a 5/2/0 nasus with 500+ stacks at 20 mins and still lost cause of feeding and what not.
i suspect ill probably lose all my placement games, season 10 has start as nothing but laughable for me

update, ended going 1-9 in placements with the last game having a smurf (streaksofgrey) who ended the game with nearly 500 cs, next closest person was their adc on 220.
ended up in B2 from G3. thanks riot.

The worst part is the feeling it brings... like... bringing down the morale and making you tilt and not wanna play rank anymore...
I did that for a few years... no rank whatsoever - last year i only played some dodgy ranked games to be able to test clash... thinking this year might be the same
I thought it's just me. Im placed on B2 from Gold 4. Every. Single. Placements. Someone is feeding and I thought its weird.

100% feel you, ive been getting people who were iron last season all day, i finished in gold 3 and haven't come across a single person on my team that was higher than silver 4 last season. Not to mention the massive frame rate drops that have started since the last update.
yet another classic riot patch to absolutely drive the ranked ques into dog shit and a piss poor attempt to fix anything
has it ever occured to u the problem may be with your gameplay and not their game big boy??

Have you considered that if multiple people have the issue, its the game?

No? Yeah, I didn't think so.

I've duo'd with a friend in master while he was on a smurf, he has the same complaints about the game. We played two in a row recently. Couldn't carry them, people just running it down. Won't listen to advice. The game is in the worst state I have ever seen it.

To be fair, I don't really understand why you are all playing ranked right at the very beginning?  That's a recipe for disaster...

It's the start of the season, everyone is hyped and jumps straight into ranked thinking "This time I'll get placed in gold for sure!!!"
So you're mixed in with very high elo people who because of the reset aren't up where they should be yet, as well as all the terrible players who accidentally got higher than they should.  As well as all the people who don't even play ranked, just jumping in to do their promos in the hope that this time they get gold.

Soon enough,  the terrible players will fall down to where they should be, the good players will rise above you, and the people who only play to see if they get gold, get ranked in bronze and stop playing ranked until next season.  Thats when you should start playing ranked, you are far more likely to get a balanced matchup.

Obviously to each their own, but if you're relying on your own skill to rank up, It boggles my mind that you'd play now when you know all these players are likely to be in your tier because of the reset.  Too many wild cards.  It's an unessecary risk?

Wait until it all quietens down and the game has time to segregate out all the players again.

On the off chance this ISN'T bait, waiting it out will give you only boosters, boosted accounts, paid for accounts, afkers, hardcore inters, and any other type of troll you can imagine. 

Getting in early least gives you an even chance of having smurfs on your team.

> On the off chance this ISN'T bait, waiting it out will give you only boosters, boosted accounts, paid for accounts, afkers, hardcore inters, and any other type of troll you can imagine.

Why?

> Getting in early least gives you an even chance of having smurfs on your team.

Just as likely to get it on the enemy team.
Either way, it's still taking the game out of your own hands. Might as well just sit in your room flipping coins instead of playing.

Giving this thing another UP!

I just lost another game in which our jungler [removed] behaved like a bot.... running in with the last bit left on his ult under enemy tower, running it to 1v5, sitting next to buff waiting for it to spawn for a couple of seconds then going to a different camp when the buff didn't spawn ( was taken by enemy) etc... basically... what you would expect a bto to do... but he pinged and wrote a couple of lines at the end of the game when everyone said we would report him for using bots....

now.... how is that fair? when that person purposely feeds an ADC like twitch (which is busted as you all know if he is ahead with a couple of kills).

And Riot does nothing about it, says everything is perfect....

What about some of the "Emissaries" and other people in the boards come and talk a it about it and tells us what we can do? because I bet that person didn't even get a ban and wasn't the first time doing it.
